# NSDecimalNumber.RoundingMode.down

**Case**

Round return values down.

## Declaration

```swift
case down
```

## Constants

- **NSDecimalNumber.RoundingMode.plain**: Round to the closest possible return value; when caught halfway between two positive numbers, round up; when caught between two negative numbers, round down.
- **NSDecimalNumber.RoundingMode.up**: Round return values up.
- **NSDecimalNumber.RoundingMode.bankers**: Round to the closest possible return value; when halfway between two possibilities, return the possibility whose last digit is even.
